content.rendered:
Directed by Arjun Mukerjee

Written by Althea Kaushal

Cast Aisha Ahmed (Malini Mathur).Tarun Anand. Richa Chadha (Leela (as Richa Chadda)).Gopal Das. Mallhar Goenka (Reception Boy). Sharman Joshi (Shankar Verma). Saunskruti Kher (Varsha’s neighbour). Omkar Kulkarni (Anton). Masumeh Makhija (Varsha). Himanshu Malik (Ganpatrao). Himmat Mav (Mukul). Umair Patel (Musical Artist (archive sound)). Ankit Rathi (Suhail). Pulkit Samrat (Vilas Naik). Renuka Shahane (Flory Mendonca). K K Shukla (School Teacher). Akriti Singh (News Reporter). Laksh Singh (Dominic)

Languages Hindi

Producers Farhan Akhtar. Pooja Gupta. Santosh Narvekar. Ritesh Sidhwani. Priya Sreedharan

Production B4U Television Network
